text: Carl Demonte Crawford (born August 5, 1981) is an American professional baseball player. His nickname is "The Perfect Storm". Crawford has played for the Tampa Bay Devil Rays, Tampa Bay Rays, Boston Red Sox, and Los Angeles Dodgers. Crawford plays the position of outfielder. He bats and throws left- handed. Crawford started his major league career in 2002. Crawford has hit more triples than any other active baseball player. ==References== Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:Tampa Bay Rays players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:Tampa Bay Devil Rays players
title: Carl Crawford
